meanings.definition: To treat as a celebrity or object of great interest.
meanings.sent1: The town lionizes the local hero for his bravery in saving the cat from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The community lionizes the famous singer whenever she performs on stage.
meanings.sent3: The school lionizes the cafeteria lady for her delicious cookies.
meanings.sent4: The company lionizes its top salesperson as the face of success.
meanings.sent5: The museum lionizes the ancient artifact as a priceless treasure.

meanings.definition: To give a lot of attention and admiration to someone.
meanings.sent1: The teacher lionizes her students when they excel in their studies.
meanings.sent2: The fans lionize their favorite athlete by cheering loudly at every game.
meanings.sent3: The children lionize the ice cream truck driver for bringing sweet treats on hot days.
meanings.sent4: The boss lionizes the hardworking employee with a promotion and a raise.
meanings.sent5: The community lionizes the volunteer firefighter for his bravery in rescuing a kitten from a burning building.
